Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1976...
Injured on 4/10/1977 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/16/1980, off Jerald Theis (LYN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/18/1980, off Sal Aranda (PEN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1980, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1980, hitting .346 with 1 HR, 62 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 9/21/1981...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1982...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Troy on 5/2/1983...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1983...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Traded from Ashburn to Bay City on 7/31/1989 (Going to BC: SS T. Boyle. Going to Ash: P V. Lopez, P G. Ledbetter)...
